tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Me and my husband were going through a low phase in our life when our infertility treatment was not successful. We were heart broken and lost all hope.

*** **** * **** ** **** ***** **** ******** ** ********* **** ****** *** **** *********** *********** We thought of giving it at a last try and booked an appointment with Dr. Roya Rozati. She owns the hospital and is considered to be one of the best infertility treatment specialists in Hyderabad.

She carefully listened to all our problems, including how we went through an infertility treatment before and did not find any success with it. Dr. Roya Rozati was supportive and caring and she asked her to go through her treatment. She assured us of getting successful results.

We were a bit hesitant at first but then we listened to her. After almost 1 year, I am a mother of a 3 month old baby. **** *** ********* *** ****** *********** *********** Dr. Roya Rozati was able to help me conceive. I am not only grateful to her but also her entire team of doctors, nurse, medical staffs and lab technicians were excellent at their job.

I will suggest every couple who had an unsuccessful infertility treatment or wants to treat their infertility should get in touch with Dr. Roya Rozati as she will provide them the **** treatment and assist them in achieving a successful pregnancy.

I really feel blessed that I visited Dr Roya Rozati Clinic a year ago and met her, an awesome IVF specialist in Hyderabad. The kind of support, both at personal and treatment level, I got from her and her whole staff is simply out of the world. I got the kind of emotional support, I was seeking through out the treatment, It was just like having a IVF specialist in your family and sharing your concerns openly. The overall treatment I received here has also been any top class IVF clinic in India and that is too in a very friendly environment without losing a personal touch from your doctor.

She is Very arrogant and won't treat patients properly. Depends on her mood she will respond to patients. In my whole career I didn't see this type of impatience doctor that too as gynecologist. Very bad behavior and here comes the staff they won't understand the perception written by doctor and the main point is they will charge 700/- per each visit even if you visit today and again came tomorrow to get some clarity on perception then again charge 700/-. Overall if I have rating system in negative then I will give -5 to this doctor. Please be cautious about this doctor and another thing I want to mention here was they won't provide bills for the amount what ever we are paying so that you won't have chance to remembrance your amount.
Doctor screams, receptionist not know t behave with patients, the receptionist does not how to write name. Please don't visit her...

I can not clarify in words that how troublesome it is the point at which you heard that your mother is having extremely life-threatening disease and when you see her almost in faint-like situation day-night.Around then we happen to have confidence in either God or A Doctor. I chose to keep confidence in specialist named Dr Roya Rozati, as recommended by one of my dear friend whose spouse was patient of Dr. Roya. Immediately I and reached with my Mom. It was exceptionally pleasant that we had not to hold up even a single minute late of our appointment time. Since she has a great deal of years of experience, clearly, the surgery was effective and post surgery safety measures were at that point taken. Today my mom is healthy at all. I would suggest everyone that first please take note of experience of the doctor because this is the thing that brings life nothing else.

I would recommend Dr Roya Rozati to others for sure. She is so approachable and friendly and treat patients like her friend. I was consulting her from the very 1st Month of my wife's pregnancy till delivery as well. Meet her and relax, i think you don't have to worry as long as you follow her advise during the 9 months. 

I would definitely recommend her to all expectant mothers to consult her!

** **** ** *** **** * ********** *** ** * ***** ***** *** **** **** ********** *** ***********She listens to her patients so serenely and advice her patients accordingly. Her greatest quality is her understanding level..Had a magnificent involvement with her.

A very organised and Clean set up..it was very smooth.everything was in a flow no confusion we were guided and cared very good patient care. Dr Roya is a patient friendly doctor and always clarified any queries related to pregnancy. Her constant guidance and treatment provided made us confident.All the doctors and Staff looks good and cooperative helping nature over all experience I can say is satisfied very much..

Everything is acceptable and well disposed environment gave by all staff....Had great involvement with the facility ... Extremely exact treatment and proposals and remedies by Dr. Roya Rozati.... Truly would love to suggest anybody without a look of thought.....

It is hard to find the words to thank the people that made our dreams come true. 4 years after challenges, your facility found the root of the issue and brought us our sweet twins. I felt that I was receiving the best possible care with Dr Roya as my doctor. I appreciate her sensitivity to all of my needs it was a great experience to deal with her and staff who are kind, helpful, knowledgeable and professional. Thank You..

I had a really wonderful experience with Dr. Roya Rozati I had such a difficult time getting pregnant and faced a number of fertility issues. I faced a lot of emotionally difficult times, but I found Dr. Roya Rozati to be competent, and reassuring while also providing me with realistic information about the procedures I would be facing. I am now 12 weeks pregnant. I really thankful to Dr. Roya Rozati.

After having 3 failed pregnancies, I decided to go for IVF. One of my friend suggested me Dr.Roya Rozati's Clinic. She is one of the experienced and the warmest doctor I have ever met. As per her advice we follow all the instructions & guidence. In result in few months we have received good news. Now  So I would highly recommend you to consult her once.

I really feel blessed that I visited this Fertility Clinic and met Dr. Roya Rozati, an awesome IVF specialist in Hyderabad.The kind of support, both at personal and treatment level, I got from her and the result is I am 4 months pregnant now.all credit goes to Dr. Roya Rozati.

I am very comfortable after taking consultation at Dr. Roya Rozati Clinic. I believe it is one of the best IVF clinic where individual attention is given towards patients during the treatment. I had two failed IVF cycles at other clinics before being positive here. I received the best medical care and got a son thus bringing the greatest happiness in my life. I would highly recommend Dr. Roya Rozati to everyone, she is very helpful and supportive.

review:
She is a very friendly doctor with a lot of experience in fertility treatments in Hyderabad. I found her through a friend who got treated by her after 10 years of complicated  pregnancy.  Her guidance helped me a lot in overcoming most tough phase of my life. 

Her hands are truly blessed.

I am totally happy and trust doctor potential.i heard lot of positive feedback and patient success,satisfaction stories. That's make me to approach doctor for treatment. I would like to suggest to improve appointment and avail timely. For office goers it's a big constraint to provide some unproductive hours and awaiting for long.. no proper or timely appointments available that make me to wait for minimum 3 hours on every visit. When I ask receptionist they were less trained and give me one simple answer on 
all my queries to talk to doctor.. I am not offending anyone just want to values everyone times
Doctor gave me medicines for cure whereas other doctors were suggesting surgery.I am surprised and hope to recover soon.Thanks madam.
I like to come here, lot of my health issues solved . I will recommend in my friends and relatives to consult for their health issues.

After 6 years trying to conceive I finally got pregnant after I contacted Dr. Roya Rozati, It was simply amazing.She is very direct and to the point. 
Dr. Roya Rozati and IVF clinic are wonderful and I'd like to wholeheartedly recommend them.

The best IVF clinic, Dr roya rozati is very knowledgeable , helpful and very supportive. Here my sister get personal attention from doctor without any hesitation at any time. Thanks to Dr. Roya Rozati

review: A very patient, honest and cheerful doctor. You tend to forget all your worries when you are with her. The finest infertility specialist in Hyderabad. Blessed to have met her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have seen many good reviews about her,  but my mother recently Visited Owisi hospital,  doctor was not approchable at all..  My mother visited hospital for couple of times and she ended up with no results...  Her juniors simply said use medicine for 2 months and come back, where as my mother body cannot accept all the medicine. I think doctor should serve better service.

she is one of the best and the sweetest doctors. Best part about her is that she believes in patientsatisfaction and not money. owing to Vast expereience, she is easily able to understand the issues and provide a treatment. Visited for Infertiliy. dont be fooled by less recommendations.She is the best

Sat there and waited an hour ***** *** ****** *** ** * ******** ***** **** ****** I was 15mins ahead of the appointment. finally I left frustrated and had to literally run out if the staff who was more desperate to keep the registration fee than actually reach the doctor to tell me when she would be available.Good or great as a doctor,  definitely seems to have become more important than the need to care for patients. I'm not going to go back to the make shift hole

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I took my mother in law who had prolonged stomach pain and it was diagnosed by this highly experienced doctor to go for a surgery and she did it successfully and also it was appreciated by the US doctors who further checked her during check ups. I highly recommend her for her experience and knowledge

I completely unhappy with the treatment and the way they charge without bills. Waiting time is too long and consultation is valid for single visit..if you visit after 8pm have to pay extra money..Ovulution costs around 900 fot three scans here charges 1500 for single scan..which means double than corporate hospitaks..i dont recommend

It was more of giving confidence to patient.I feel really happy with the way she treats her patients. She is more like mother treating her child. I would highly recommend her if you are looking for pregnancy.
